mergewith.subtemplate:
<plugin spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.sitemodel.SiteModel' id="SiteModel.s:$(n)" gammaCategoryCount='0'> <!--substModel will be automatically detected /--> <proportionInvariant spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="NonNegativeReal" id='proportionInvariant.s:$(n)' value='0.0' estimate='false'/> <mutationRate spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" id='mutationRate.s:$(n)' value='1.0' estimate='false'/> <shape spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" id='gammaShape.s:$(n)' value='1.0' estimate='false'/> </plugin>
<distribution id='MutationRatePrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@mutationRate.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="0.01" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="100.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> <distribution id='GammaShapePrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.TruncatedReal' param='@gammaShape.s:$(n)'> <lower spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.1" estimate="false"/> <!--upper spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="10000.0" estimate="false"/--> <distribution spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Exponential'> <mean spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> </distribution> <distribution id='PropInvariantPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Beta' param='@proportionInvariant.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> <beta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<operator id="AVMNOperator.$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableVarianceMultivariateNormalOperator" weight="0.1" coefficient="1.0" scaleFactor="1" beta="0.05" initial="800" burnin="400" every="1" allowNonsense="true"> <transformations id="AVMNSumTransform.$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.operator.Transform$LogConstrainedSumTransform" sum="1.0"> <!-- frequencies --> </transformations> <transformations id="AVMNLogTransform.$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.operator.Transform$LogTransform"> <!-- site and substitution model parameters --> </transformations> <transformations id="AVMNNoTransform.$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.operator.Transform$NoTransform"> <!-- tree --> </transformations> </operator>
<operator id="proportionInvariantScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="proportionInvariant.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='proportionInvariantScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@proportionInvariant.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="mutationRateScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="mutationRate.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='mutationRateScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@mutationRate.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="gammaShapeScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="gammaShape.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='gammaShapeScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@gammaShape.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
Scales proportion of invariant sites parameter of partition $(n) Scales mutation rate of partition s:$(n) Scales gamma shape parameter of partition s:$(n)
Prior on gamma shape for partition s:$(n) Prior on proportion invariant for partition s:$(n)

<plugin spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.HKY' id='hky.s:$(n)'> <kappa id="kappa.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate='true'/> <frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.SimplexParam' dimension='4' value='0.25 0.25 0.25 0.25'/> </frequencies> </plugin>
<operator id="KappaScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="kappa.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='KappaScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.1" weight="0.1" parameter="@kappa.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="FrequenciesExchanger.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='FrequenciesExchangerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.DeltaExchangeOperator' delta="0.01" weight="0.1" parameter="@freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<distribution id='KappaPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.LogNormal' param='@kappa.s:$(n)' > <M spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> <S spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.25" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<distribution id='FrequenciesPrior.s:$(n)' param='@freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Dirichlet"> <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealVectorParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate="false">4.0 4.0 4.0 4.0</alpha> </distribution>
Scale HKY transition-transversion parameter of partition s:$(n)
HKY transition-transversion parameter of partition s:$(n)

<plugin spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.TN93' id='tn93.s:$(n)'> <parameter id="kappa1.s:$(n)" name='kappa1' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="kappa2.s:$(n)" name='kappa2' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate='true'/> <frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.SimplexParam' dimension='4' value='0.25 0.25 0.25 0.25'/> </frequencies> </plugin>
<operator id="kappa1Scaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="kappa1.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='kappa1ScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@kappa1.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="kappa2Scaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="kappa2.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='kappa2ScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@kappa2.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="FrequenciesExchanger.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='FrequenciesExchangerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.DeltaExchangeOperator' delta="0.01" weight="0.1" parameter="@freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<distribution id='kappa1Prior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.LogNormal' param='@kappa1.s:$(n)' > <M spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> <S spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.25" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<distribution id='kappa2Prior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.LogNormal' param='@kappa2.s:$(n)' > <M spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> <S spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.25" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<distribution id='FrequenciesPrior.s:$(n)' param='@freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Dirichlet"> <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealVectorParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate="false">4.0 4.0 4.0 4.0</alpha> </distribution>
Scale TN93 kappa1 (rateAG) parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale TN93 kappa2 (rateCT) parameter of partition s:$(n)
TN93 kappa1 (rateAG) parameter of partition s:$(n)
TN93 kappa2 (rateCT) parameter of partition s:$(n)

subtemplate.hmc: gtr/rateGT/, gtr/frequencies/, gtr/rateAT/, gtr/rateAC/, gtr/rateCG/, gtr/rateAG/, gtr/rateCT/, RateACPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateAGPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateATPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateCGPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateCTPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateGTPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateACScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateAGScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateATScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateCGScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateCTScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateGTScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/

mergewith.subtemplate:
<plugin spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.GTR' id='gtr.s:$(n)'> <parameter id="rateAC.s:$(n)" name='rateAC' value="1.0" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateAG.s:$(n)" name='rateAG' value="1.0" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateAT.s:$(n)" name='rateAT' value="1.0" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateCG.s:$(n)" name='rateCG' value="1.0" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateCT.s:$(n)" name='rateCT' value="1.0" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate='false'/> <parameter id="rateGT.s:$(n)" name='rateGT' value="1.0" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate='true'/> <frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.SimplexParam' dimension='4' value='0.25 0.25 0.25 0.25'/> </frequencies> </plugin>
<operator id="RateACScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="rateAC.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='RateACScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateAC.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="RateAGScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="rateAG.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='RateAGScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateAG.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="RateATScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="rateAT.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='RateATScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateAT.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="RateCGScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="rateCG.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='RateCGScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateCG.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="RateCTScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="rateCT.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='RateCTScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateCT.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="RateGTScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="rateGT.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='RateGTScalerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateGT.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<operator id="FrequenciesExchanger.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='FrequenciesExchangerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.DeltaExchangeOperator' delta="0.01" weight="0.1" parameter="@freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<distribution id='RateACPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@rateAC.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.05" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="10.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> <distribution id='RateAGPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@rateAG.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.05" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="20.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> <distribution id='RateATPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@rateAT.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.05" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="10.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> <distribution id='RateCGPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@rateCG.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.05" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="10.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> <distribution id='RateCTPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@rateCT.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.05" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="20.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> <distribution id='RateGTPrior.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@rateGT.s:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.05" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="10.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<distribution id='FrequenciesPrior.s:$(n)' param='@freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Dirichlet"> <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealVectorParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate="false">4.0 4.0 4.0 4.0</alpha> </distribution>
Scale GTR A-C substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR A-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR A-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR C-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR C-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR G-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR A-C substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR A-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR A-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR C-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR C-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR G-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)

<plugin id='MutationDeathModel.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.MutationDeathModel'> <parameter name='deathprob' id='deathprob.s:$(n)' value='0.1' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate='false'/> <frequencies id='freqs.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.Frequencies'> <frequencies spec='beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.SimplexParam' value='1 0'/> </frequencies> </plugin>

<frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.substitutionmodel.Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.SimplexParam' dimension='4' value='0.25 0.25 0.25 0.25'/> </frequencies>
<operator id="FrequenciesExchanger.c:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="0.05"> <parameter idref="freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> <operator idref="AVMNOperator.$(n)"/> <operator id='FrequenciesExchangerX.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.DeltaExchangeOperator' delta="0.01" weight="0.1" parameter="@freqParameter.s:$(n)"/> </operator>
<distribution id='FrequenciesPrior.s:$(n)' param='@freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Dirichlet"> <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealVectorParam" domain="PositiveReal" estimate="false">4.0 4.0 4.0 4.0</alpha> </distribution>
Exchange values of frequencies of partition s:$(n)
